critique: The executive order seems to want the audience to feel joy and surprise. The order discusses an exception to civil service rules for Miss Edith M. Watkins, who has served for 18 years. The audience may feel joy that Miss Watkins is being recognized for her service. The audience may also feel surprise that an exception is being made to civil service rules.The order does not seem to want the audience to feel sadness, anger, fear, or disgust.
